name: Dimlight
description:
Dimlight is a game about a goblin trying to escape a maze and avoid angry ghosts. This PC game is great for people who enjoy Pixel Art games and Arcadey Puzzles. The primary mechanic of the game is the Lantern which the player must use to navigate the maze and repel ghosts. The player will have to be mindful of the fuel they use to keep the lantern illuminated, as running out means getting caught by the ghosts!

Control Scheme

WASD: Control the player character
Spacebar: Lantern ON/OFF
Arrow Keys: Control lantern intensity and fuel consumption
